Title: Customer Chats: Sarah Webb from LawVu at Microsoft Ignite 2024
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how AI is revolutionizing legal workflows with Sarah Webb from LawVu at Microsoft Ignite in Chicago. In this engaging interview, Sarah explains how LawVu is implementing AI in a contextual way for vertical deployments, with a special focus on SaaS platforms in the legal industry.

Here’s what you’ll learn: 00:00 - Introduction and AI implementation in LawVu 00:54 - Contextual AI application in SaaS platforms 01:31 - Contract summarization example 02:24 - Key date extraction and its importance 03:57 - AI integration into workflows 04:10 - The role of AI in solving customer problems

Sarah offers valuable insights into how AI is being used to alleviate administrative burdens, empowering legal professionals to focus on strategic work. She highlights the importance of understanding customer needs and delivering trusted solutions in regulated industries.

Speakers: Sarah Webb https://nz.linkedin.com/in/saraheforbes Pierre Roman https://www.linkedin.com/in/pierreroman
